h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: Be wary though, if you are unable to cause this big damage hit, Red Loong will awaken and trigger his own electric explosion as he rises, and you’ll want to retreat well away before this happens.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Be wary though, if you are unable to cause this big damage hit, Red Loong will awaken and trigger his own electric explosion as he rises, and you’ll want to retreat well away before this happens.
